node.detail_zh: 患者為泰籍被羈留人士，沒有病徵，7 月中曾與第 #3741 宗個案患者見面及用餐， 7 月 31 日被判處入獄 8 周，懲教署按既定機制安排患者在荔枝角收押所接受隔離觀察，其間有進行體溫探測，體溫正常。8 月 22 日，患者被轉送到壁屋監獄繼續服刑，其間被安排於處理及清洗污衣的工場工作，負責清洗醫管局轄下醫院的污衣，當中包括病人使用過的衣服、床單被袋等。9 月 4 曰患者服刑完畢由壁屋監獄轉送青山灣入境事務中心等候遣返，因疫情關係，所有新進入中心的被羈留人士均須接受毒病測試，檢測後確診。
node.detail_en: The patient is a detainee of Thai nationality and has no symptoms. In mid-July he met and dined with patient #3741, He was sentenced for imprisonment for eight weeks on July 31, and was quarantined at Lai Chi Kok Reception Centre, where his temperature checks were normal. On August 22, he was transferred to Pik Uk Prison and assigned to undertake laundry work. He was responsible for the laundry from hospitals under Hospital Authority, including clothing and beddings used by patients. On September 4, upon the end of his detention period he was transferred to Castle Peak Bay Immigration Centre awaiting deportation, and tested positive for the virus.
